body:
During declare blockers step and after some blockers are declared, if player undo and then re-enter the declare blockers phase, the blockers declared previously is used.

The correct behavior is that the blockers should not be blocking, i.e. as if this is the first time entering the declare blockers step
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: undo does not clear blockers
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on July 22, 2011 20:49:33_

During declare blockers step and after some blockers are declared, if player undo and then re-enter the declare blockers phase, the blockers declared previously is used.

The correct behavior is that the blockers should not be blocking, i.e. as if this is the first time entering the declare blockers step

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=31_
